[[Kabuto]] analyses an opponent's facial expression, movements, and the properties of their [[jutsu]] to anticipate where and how he will be attacked.<ref name="d2"/> He then gathers [[chakra]] to the area of his body where the attack will strike,<ref name="c168">''Naruto'' chapter 168</ref> preemptively starting medical treatment in order to minimise the damage he'll receive.<ref name="d2"/> The more extensive the damage, the more chakra it takes to heal; the damage from [[Rasengan]] is so great that Kabuto lacks enough chakra to fully recover.<ref name="c168"/> In addition to needing to correctly read the opponent and react in time, users require great resilience in order to perform the jutsu, traits that only Kabuto possesses.<ref name="d2"/>

== Trivia ==
* Kabuto stated that it was because of this technique that he is so favoured by [[Orochimaru]], as his ability to activate and reproduce cells makes him invaluable for Orochimaru's experiments.<ref name="c168"/>
* In the anime, [[Tsunade]], after having seen Kabuto perform it, took inspiration from this technique to develop a [[Cell Activation Technique|similar procedure]] which she uses  to increase the survival rate of [[Rock Lee]]'s spinal surgery from 50% to 58%.<ref>''Naruto'' episode 100</ref>
